channel.title: How do i change the coords for the range targets?
channel.description:
can some1 tell me how to make varrok a safe zone or give a link to a tut? thx :confused:
EDIT: My new problem is where can i find the targets from ::range so that i can move them to the dummies?

item.title: How do i change the coords for the range targets?
item.dc:creator: @Phonecheck Phonecheck
item.description:
@Phonecheck wrote:

Ok skater before you even think about adding OBJECTS you must complete -fedexers- global objects tut found here. [url]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,35848.0.html
then find out whats the id for range targets by checking your moparscape objects file.The tut above explains how to add objects.

item.description:
@skater_chick wrote:

umm, ive tried using tht tut but i dont think it works with pinpscape. does any1 know how to do this?!?!?![br][size=1]Posted on: January 03, 2007, 09:25:17 PM[/size][hr]okay, i wanted varrok a safe zone to move my mall but i got an idea. could i mmove the targets from ::Range to the dumies and make ::range the new mall location?[br][size=1]Posted on: January 04, 2007, 04:53:37 PM[/size][hr]ummm, i have no clue where i could find the targets in my sorce so that i can change the location. any1 kno wat folder its in? -thx[br][size=1]Posted on: January 04, 2007, 05:23:38 PM[/size][hr]can any1 help me? :eek: :([br][size=1]Posted on: January 04, 2007, 05:42:41 PM[/size][hr]Why 80+ views and like 10 posts? is there any1 that can help?

item.title: How do i change the coords for the range targets?
item.dc:creator: @curse63 curse63
item.description:
@curse63 wrote:

Ok,if range is a safezone,copy and paste the code that makes range a safezone,then,take ::range out of the spot where the thing makes it a safezone.replace it with varrock.

I hope that works.

EDIT: THANK YOU!! NOW I DON’T HAVE TO REPORT YOU-YOU ACTUALLY POSTED IN THE RIGHT SWECTION!!! TY TY TY TY TY!!!
